mod.name: TheVacant
mod.description: A cursed soul is bound to an artifact and doomed to climb the Spire.

cards.name: Break Self
cards.description: thevacant:Release: Lose 2 HP and gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Break Self+
cards.description: thevacant:Release: Lose 2 HP and gain 14 Block.

cards.name: Crunch
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
If you are thevacant:Healthy, apply 1 Weak. If you are thevacant:Wounded, apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Crunch+

Deal 6 damage.
If you are thevacant:Healthy, apply 2 Weak. If you are thevacant:Wounded, apply 2 Vulnerable.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Return+

Ethereal.

relics.name: Brass Goblet
relics.description: You have 1 additional Dexterity while you are thevacant:Healthy, and 2 additional Strength while you are thevacant:Wounded.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact with dark power.

relics.name: Wretched Gem
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if you are thevacant:Healthy, lose 2 Max HP. If you are thevacant:Wounded, gain 4 Max HP. You can't go below 50 Max HP this way.
relics.flavorText: A cursed trap that contains your soul.

relics.name: Deathbell
relics.description: If you are thevacant:Wounded, whenever you thevacant:Mill, thevacant:Mill an additional 2.
relics.flavorText: The scent invokes a feeling of dread.

relics.name: Bound Soul
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 thevacant:Will. Once per combat, if you are thevacant:Wounded, gain 1 additional thevacant:Will.

keywords.name: Thevacant:fracture
keywords.description: Fracture effects happen when you have X or more Will.

keywords.name: Thevacant:healthy
keywords.description: Healthy effects trigger if you are above 50% of your max health.

keywords.name: Thevacant:heavy
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:light
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the top of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:mill
keywords.description: Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile. Gain Void for each card moved.

keywords.name: Thevacant:rebound
keywords.description: If this card would be Milled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:release
keywords.description: Do the following effect once for each Will you have.

keywords.name: Thevacant:unnate
keywords.description: Starts at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:will
keywords.description: Your ability to fight the influence of the artifact.

keywords.name: Thevacant:wounded
keywords.description: Wounded effects trigger if you are at or below 50% of your max health.
